title: Recruiting Company with a Plan
text: Pros +has an overall plan on how to differentiate itself in the market and achieve success +flat hierarchy and company leaders very approachable, happy to offer advice or even training +young company with good energy and effort put into maintaining its culture +plenty of room for company to grow, means future will have advancement potential Cons -still finding out how to achieve its goals, so day to day strategy and KPIs shift as company figures out what does and doesn't work, not good for people who cant or don't want to adapt -like most startups expect to work late regularly -office close to capacity and though they have avoided packing people in like some startups do, there will likely be an office move in the near future Advice to Management Keep a bit more of an open ear to the team when they say something Is or Isnt working, seems like it takes some time before they are taken seriously.
pros: +has an overall plan on how to differentiate itself in the market and achieve success
cons: -still finding out how to achieve its goals, so day to day strategy and KPIs shift as company figures out what does and doesn't work, not good for people who cant or don't want to adapt

title: Would not recommend
text: Pros The location of the office is quite cool... Cons Some people seem frustrsted and hostile there. Management always "knows" best and employees have almost no voice (Which i assume leads to being hostile). A culture of smart, innovative startup is forced, but it's just a sugarcoat. From welcoming to farewell, I had only cringing conversations with the management. Felt personal, immature and unprofessional. Advice to Management Stop belittling people. Be transparent. Learn how to be leaders. Gain the real respect of your team, not only because you are the boss.

title: Really motivated colleagues
text: Pros It's a great team to work with. Everyone is really motivated and wants to pull their weight. The founders are also really open to new ideas and experiment, meaning you can learn a lot at this company. Cons I would have liked some more regular after-work social events. It would be particularly helpful for new hires. However, the monthly team lunch is also a good chance to get to know the team.

title: Ein super Arbeitsumfeld
text: Pros Die typischen flachen Strukturen und dynamischen aber strukturierten Arbeitsprozesse wie man sie aus einem StartUp kennt, werden hier vorgelebt. Das Team ist sehr international aufgestellt und hat einen starken, fast schon familiären Zusammenhalt. (regelmäßige Teamevents usw.) Man erhält Einblicke in alle Arbeitsbereiche und kann von fähigen und motivierten Kollegen und Gründern viel lernen. Alles in allem ein etablierter Arbeitgeber, der weiterhin wächst und sich erfolgreich am Markt etabliert. Durch die gute Vernetzung in alle Business Bereiche ein weiteres Plus und jederzeit weiterzuempfehlen! Cons derzeit keine Gründe die gegen eine Bewerbung bei Taledo sprechen Advice to Management Den eingeschlagenen Weg und Strategie weitergehen!
